channel.title: Error with compiler
channel.description:
Whenever I try to compile I get this error: javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
And this is the code of my compier: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Does anyone know what the problem is?

item.title: Error with compiler
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

Try setting up environmental variables

^LOL
it is that your compiler can’t find your java files
do you really have your java files in the direction where your compiler is or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Error with compiler
item.dc:creator: @I_fk I fk
item.description:
@I_fk wrote:

Whenever I try to compile I get this error:
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

And this is the code of my compier:
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Does anyone know what the problem is?

Read full topic
